metadata.description: Collection of Agent Skills for Clix.

plugins.name: clix-integration
plugins.description: Integrates Clix SDK into mobile projects. Use when the user asks to install/setup/integrate Clix, or when the user types "clix-integration".

plugins.name: clix-event-tracking
plugins.description: Implements Clix event tracking (Clix.trackEvent) with naming and schema best practices. Use when the user talks about events/properties/funnels, or when the user types "clix-event-tracking".

plugins.name: clix-user-management
plugins.description: Implements Clix user identification and user properties (setUserId, setUserProperty) with logout best practices and campaign-ready usage. Use when the user talks about login/logout/userId/user properties, or when the user types "clix-user-management".

plugins.name: clix-personalization
plugins.description: Helps developers author and debug Clix personalization templates (Liquid-style) for message content, deep links/URLs, and audience targeting. Use when the user mentions personalization variables, Liquid, templates, conditional logic, loops, filters, deep links, message logs, or when the user types "clix-personalization".

plugins.name: clix-api-triggered-campaigns
plugins.description: Configures API-triggered campaigns in the console and triggers them from your backend with safe auth, dynamic filters (trigger.*), and personalization patterns. Use when the user talks about API-triggered campaigns, API-triggered campaigns setup, API-triggered campaigns triggers, API-triggered campaigns filters, API-triggered campaigns personalization, or when the user types "clix-api-triggered-campaigns".
